name: A Ship Out of Time
description:
Controls:

  • Left Mouse/Touch: Move
  • 'W' key/tap 'Warp' button: Time-warp your ship 
  • 'Esc' key: Pause

Note: Each pilot is randomized & unique... some fly slower, others shoot faster.  Be sure to boost stats before they run... out of time!

Story:

The year is 20X6 and our sun will go nova in 3 minutes.

You have an experimental time-warp engine that can save us if you can get it to our planet in time.

Use the engine during your flight to jump back in time to delay the inevitable.  Time-warp to avoid danger and boost your pilots' skills.

Beware!  The time-warp drive is unstable and can explode on its own.  Alarms will sound when things are getting critical, but you won't make it to the planet if you play it safe.
